TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSecureResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 通过包装 对象和限制基础 有权访问的资源，帮助保护 的另一个实现。

span.span: Helps to secure another implementation of by wrapping the object and restricting the resources that the underlying has access to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 命名空间中所有类的默认解析器。The class is the default resolver for all classes in the namespace. 它用于加载 XML 文档和解析外部资源，如实体、 Dtd 或架构，并导入或 include 指令。It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives. 可以通过指定重写此默认设置要使用对象。You can override this default by specifying the object to use. 例如，如果你想要限制的资源的基础都可以访问，你可以使用对象。For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying can access, you can use an object. 回绕的具体实现并限制资源的基础有权访问。 wraps around a concrete implementation of and restricts the resources that the underlying has access to. 例如，已禁止发生从嵌入的统一资源标识符 (URI) 引用的跨域重定向的能力。For example, has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference. 构造时对象，提供有效实现，连同的 URL，evidence 对象或权限集的实例由来确定安全。When you construct an object, you provide a valid implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the to determine security. 任一生成或使用现有和称为于该功能来帮助保护基础。Either a is generated or the existing one is used and is called on it to help secure the underlying . > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象可以包含敏感信息，例如用户凭据。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 应为缓存时请小心对象，并且不应将传递到不受信任的组件的对象。You should be careful when caching objects and should not pass the object to an untrusted component. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有安全基础结构的.NET Framework 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 上运行的代码和在集成在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 内 CLR 上运行的代码中的差异。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 这可能导致 CLR 集成是为.NET Framework CLR 以不同方式运行时使用的 SQL Server 上开发的代码的情况下。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 其中一种差异会影响类必须基于 URL 的证据时 (即，当使用方法或构造函数)。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). 策略解析的 SQL Server 的机制集成 CLR 不使用或信息。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反，它会授予权限基于程序集加载时，服务器会将添加的 GUID。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 当你使用中 SQL Server 集成的 CLR，使用指定的直接提供任何所需的证据。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## 使用安全冲突解决程序To use a secure resolver 1. 使用正确的权限集创建 对象。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 创建使用 对象的 对象。Create an object that uses the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5a)] 3. 传递对象传递给方法在创建时对象。Pass the object to the method when you're creating the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5b)] ## 通过使用 URL 来限制访问To restrict access by using a URL 使用构造函数来创建允许访问你本地 intranet 站点的对象。Use the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#3)] ## 通过使用权限集来限制访问To restrict access by using a permission set 1. 创建 对象。Create a object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4a)] 2. 指定你想要允许访问的 Url。Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4b)] 3. 将 Web 权限添加到 对象中。Add the web permissions to the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4c)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4c)] 4. 使用构造函数来创建对象使用的权限集。Use the constructor to create an object by using the permission set. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4d)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4d)] 请参阅引用另一个示例页。See the reference page for another example. ## 通过使用的证据来限制访问To restrict access by using evidence 你可以通过使用来限制访问构造函数并指定。You can restrict access by using the constructor and specifying . 用于创建应用于基础 的 。The is used to create the that is applied to the underlying . 在打开任何资源之前， 在已创建的 上调用 。The calls on the created before opening any resources. 下面是证据的一些常见方案和每个提供类型：Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - 如果你正处于完全可信的环境，使用您的程序集来创建证据：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果您正在不完全受信任的环境中，你拥有的代码或数据来自外部源，并且您知道的源的外部源和具有可验证的 URI，使用 URI 来创建证据：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果您正处于不完全受信任的环境和你提供了代码或数据来自外部源，但你不知道的源的外部源，或者：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 将 `evidence` 参数设置为 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 这样将不允许对资源进行任何访问。This allows no access to resources. 或-or- 如果应用程序要求对资源进行一些访问，应向调用方请求数据。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller. ## 使用安全的冲突解决程序加载 XSLT 样式表To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1. 使用正确的权限集创建 对象。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 将 传递到 方法。Pass the to the method. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#6)]

span.span: This class has an inheritance demand.

para.span: 需要完全信任继承自类。

span.span: Full trust is required to inherit from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三个构造函数提供三种类型的访问限制：The three constructors provide three types of access restrictions: - 构造函数来使用 URL 限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using a URL. - 构造函数通过使用权限集限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using a permission set. - 构造函数使用的证据来限制访问。The constructor restricts access by using evidence. 请参阅限制这些类型的示例的构造函数参考主题。See the constructor reference topics for examples of these types of restrictions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是证据的一些可能的方案和每个方案提供类型：Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - 如果你正处于完全可信的环境，使用您的程序集来创建证据：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果您正在不完全受信任的环境中，你拥有的代码或数据来自外部源，并且您知道的源的外部源和具有可验证的 URI，使用 URI 来创建证据：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果您正处于不完全受信任的环境和你提供了代码或数据来自外部源，但你不知道的源的外部源，或者：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 将 `evidence` 参数设置为 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 这样将不允许对资源进行任何访问。This allows no access to resources. 或-or- 如果应用程序要求对资源进行一些访问，应向调用方请求数据。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 有安全基础结构的.NET Framework 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 上运行的代码和在集成在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 内 CLR 上运行的代码中的差异。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 这可能导致 CLR 集成是为.NET Framework CLR 以不同方式运行时使用的 SQL Server 上开发的代码的情况下。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 其中一种差异会影响类必须基于 URL 的证据时 (即，当使用方法或构造函数)。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). 策略解析的 SQL Server 的机制集成 CLR 不使用或信息。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反，它会授予权限基于程序集加载时，服务器会将添加的 GUID。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 当你使用中 SQL Server 集成的 CLR，使用指定的直接提供任何所需的证据。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## Examples 此示例使用构造函数来创建允许访问你本地 intranet 站点的对象。This example uses the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 你的应用程序可以缓解内存拒绝服务威胁到方法通过实现限制读取的字节数。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing an that limits the number of bytes read. 这有助于防止恶意代码尝试传递到的字节的无限流的情况下出现方法。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method.

is .

span.span: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
